item.title: How to Use Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian Knowledge base software based on linkable plain text .md (=markdown) files. My personal usage guidelines write everything in English Tags Control #wip - work in progress

item.title: How to Write Book Summary
item.description: The Goal The goal of my personal book summary is to connect and embed the thoughts presented in the book into my personal active knowledge.

item.title: Investment Guidelines 2022
item.description: 2022-08-03 10:00 This little writing will contain my guidelines for investing in 2022 and forward. I will summarize here my goals and intentions of investing.

item.title: Sleep Better Tips
item.description: clean up in your head, organize the next day and end the current one, clean up the white board take a few (at least 6) deep breaths to calm yourself down always go to sleep at the same time every day, including weekend workout, take cold showers and eat with a time buffer (if i go to sleep at 23:00, try to avoid these activities from 20:00 or so) naps through-out the day no longer than 30mins.
